code.displayName: Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Physician Assistants and Advanced Practice Nursing Providers
Relevant diagnostic tests and/or laboratory data

td.content: s:patient presents with 3 weeks history of worsening Kidney. pt is a white male retired aged 77 yrs. Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol he does not smoke o:Height 74 in, Weight 156 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 15 a:Kidney Stones p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, and ordered Urinalysis, Complete.

s:a 78 yr old white M retired presents with Kidney of 12 days duration. o:Height 74 in, Weight 157 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 73, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 16 a:Kidney Stones p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, and ordered Urinalysis, Complete.
